what type of faculty are here?
Does faculty have friendly relationship with students?
responses: We have best faculty here,Maximum of us are completed Masters in our fields.Every lecturer will show special interest on students who are poor in studies.

patterns: Are MNC companies recruit these students.
what is the average percentage of placements.
responses: More than 50+ Companies like Lumen,Accenture,Ashling Partners,Aadhar,AMP,Clarivate,Hexaware,MindTree,Plintron,Infomerica,Hidden Brains,DXC Technology,WIPRO,CADSYS,Capgemini,Tech outs,ibssoftware,Tech Mahindra,ReNew Power,Virtusa,TCS,Tvarana,AmericanExpress,TIAA,Infosys,Persistent,Mphasis,Visitex,ALTEN,Reliance,Deloitte,ZENQ,ValueLabs,IBM,NTTData,HCL,Open,epam,ATOS Syntel,Big Works,Amadeus,Zop Smart,Smartsoc,Snovasys,Apps associates,Kreeti Technologies,vodafone  etc...Minimum 650 students placed every year,Our record is 30LPA.Top MNC's are came forward to recruit our students.The average salary package offered was 6 LPA.

patterns: What are events organizing in vits.
responses: Events organising in vits are:SPREE(Technical and Non-technical fest), VISVOTSAV(National Level Technical Symposium),ANNUAL DAY.

patterns: Is boys and girls hostels are seperate?
Is A/C facility is there in hostels.
responses: We have both girls and boys hostels seperately.For girls,We have both A/C and Non A/C rooms,it is an additional facility.
